name: PhotoPuzzler (Alpha)
description:
PhotoPuzzler (Alpha)

Puzzle game currently in development. Final build TBA in May!

aim of game is to progress through the building. Press E to pick up special objects (glows in thermal) and use them to open specific doors

Design - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me), Keith Connors

Tech - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me),  Keith Connors

Production - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me)

Any feedback however small will be helpful!

WASD - move

F - thermal camera

E - interact

Q - go back in certain modes

Mouse - camera movement

Assets used:

Decrepit Dungeon LITE
